name: PITOTube
body:
# Welcome to PITOTube

Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
tagline: PIpeline for Transient Objects (aka, a giant tube). Software to automate the calibration of astronomical data from the new optical cameras at the MMT Observatory.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
